alternativeNames: de Labillardière, Jacques Julien Houtou; Billardière, Jacques Julien Houtou de la; La Billardière, Jacques Julien Houtou de
comments: 'Houtou' has been spelled at various times as 'Houttou', 'Houtton' or 'Houton'
source: CMI; Berkeley Algal List from R.E.G. Pichi Sermolli 1 March 1991. Duyker, Citizen Labillardière (2003).
